name: CreateProductCatalogEntry
description:
Create a new product in the product catalog.

This tool is used to add a new product to the product catalog in Freshservice. It should be called when you need to register a fresh product entry.

parameters.name: product_unique_id
parameters.description: An integer representing the unique ID of the product to be created in the catalog.

parameters.name: product_name
parameters.description: The name of the product to be added to the catalog. It must be a string.

parameters.name: product_asset_type_id
parameters.description: The ID representing the asset type of the product in the catalog. It must be an integer.

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: product_manufacturer_name
parameters.description: Free text field for the name of the product's manufacturer.

parameters.name: product_status_id
parameters.description: The current status of the product. Use `1` for In Production, `2` for In Pipeline, or `3` for Retired.

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: procurement_mode
parameters.description: Mode of procurement: 1 for Buy, 2 for Lease, 3 for Both.

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: depreciation_type_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type. Expected to be an integer corresponding to a specific depreciation category.

parameters.name: depreciation_type_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used. Provide a string value representing this identifier.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: asset_type_id
parameters.description: Asset Type id of the Product

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: mode_of_procurement_id
parameters.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used
